description: Schedule cron accuracy evaluation - tests whether the agent creates correct cron expressions for scheduling requests

cases.user_prompt: Check the weather every morning at 8am
cases.rubric: Agent should create a recurring scheduled task for daily at 8:00 AM. A brief confirmation that the schedule was created is sufficient. Response should mention the schedule or weather check.

cases.user_prompt: Remind me about team standup every Monday at 9:30am
cases.rubric: Agent should create a recurring task for every Monday at 9:30 AM. Response should confirm the day and time.

cases.user_prompt: Send me a daily summary on weekdays at 6pm
cases.rubric: Agent should create a recurring task for weekdays (Monday-Friday) at 6:00 PM. Should correctly exclude weekends.

cases.user_prompt: Remind me to pay rent on the 1st of every month
cases.rubric: Agent should create a monthly recurring task for the 1st of each month. Time can be morning (any reasonable hour). Response should confirm monthly schedule.

cases.user_prompt: Remind me tomorrow at 3pm to call the dentist
cases.rubric: Agent should create a one-time scheduled task (not recurring) for tomorrow at 3pm. Should NOT use a cron expression. Response should confirm the one-time reminder.

cases.user_prompt: Every weekday morning at 7:15, remind me to review my task list
cases.rubric: Agent should create a recurring task for weekdays at 7:15 AM. Should correctly handle the non-standard minute value.

cases.user_prompt: Remind me about this every evening
cases.rubric: Agent should create a recurring daily task for the evening. A brief confirmation that the schedule was created is sufficient. The exact time can be any reasonable evening hour (5-8 PM).

cases.user_prompt: Every other Friday, remind me to submit timesheets
cases.rubric: Agent should create a recurring task for Fridays. Since standard cron cannot express bi-weekly, a weekly Friday schedule or any reasonable approximation is acceptable. Must actually create the schedule.
